message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,500. I think it will be a great benefit to you and am happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I understand your offer, I can't go lower than $12,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I believe it will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,000. Can you consider that?
